data.text: In this American English Pronunciation video, we're going to go over the idiom 'in the loop.'

data.text: Have you ever heard anyone say "keep me in the loop", or, "I want to stay in the loop"?

translation.text: Bạn đã bao giờ nghe ai nói "giữ tôi trong vòng lặp" hay "Tôi muốn ở lại vòng lặp" chưa?

data.text: This idiom means to be informed or connected. For example, if you're working on a project

data.text: interested in staying involved or informed, you can say, "Great, keep me in the loop."

translation.text: quan tâm đến việc tham gia hoặc thông báo, bạn có thể nói, "Tuyệt vời, hãy giữ tôi trong vòng lặp."

data.text: Practice your English: make up a phrase with the idiom "In the Loop" and record yourself.
